name: Astro: Overload
description: A different style of space shooter. Move around freely within the void of space as you battle enemy starships that are out to destroy you. The longer you can survive, the higher your score will get. The more enemies you defeat, the higher your score will get. How high can you get it? How hard will you play? Will you take on an extremely challenging battle on hard mode, or will you relax and have some fun on easy or medium difficulty? The choices are in your hands, but so is your very survival...
